page.pageName: Solution page | Cloudflare One: Data protection

metaTags.metaTitle: Data Protection | Mitigate Risk & Strengthen Compliance | Cloudflare One
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare One for Data Protection offers a unified suite to protect data everywhere across web, SaaS, and private applications. Built on and delivered across our entire global network, Cloudflare One's data protection suite is architected for the risks of modern coding and AI.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare extends inline security controls to deliver simple, preventative cloud security. Announcement >

relatedBlades.title: Protect your sensitive data with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Improve visibility and simplify protection with unified security services
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's connectivity cloud helps you regain visibility and control over sensitive data across web, SaaS, private applications, and even AI tools and codebases.

columnContent.title: Simplified management
columnContent.description: Unify data visibility and controls on one platform and network. Flexible options to send traffic for enforcement, and many practical ways to deploy.

columnContent.title: Frictionless UX
columnContent.description: Fast, reliable, and consistent enforcement of data controls thanks to single-pass inspection across our global network.

columnContent.title: Built to innovate with your evolving needs
columnContent.description: Our composable services work seamlessly together, so your business can add new protections and adapt to new risks with agility.

relatedBlades.title: Data protection powered by a global platform and network
relatedBlades.copy:
- Scan for and remediate misconfigured public repositories like GitHub that risk code leaks. Detect source code in up/downloads and apply controls. 
- Scan SaaS apps for suspicious activity, misconfigurations, and sensitive data. Take prescriptive steps to remediate risks via SWG policies.
- Scan for sensitive data in traffic and files, and configure block policies with DLP. Discover and manage Shadow IT. Secure access to data in apps with ZTNA.
- Prevent users from copy/pasting/inputting sensitive data into AI tools like ChatGPT.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Cloudflare converges visibility and controls across DLP, CASB, ZTNA, SWG, RBI, and email security services onto a single platform for simpler management.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Applied Systems uses Cloudflare to protect sensitive data in Gen AI tools

content.value: Applied Systems wanted to experiment with generative AI, but were concerned about employees feeding sensitive data into an AI tool.

They use Cloudflare's Remote Browser Isolation to monitor and control how users manipulate data in AI  including restricting download, upload, and copy/paste. Now, the company has found a strong balance between security and innovation.

"Over the past few years, Cloudflare has helped us consolidate security controls across our users, applications, and networks...Going forward, we are excited for Cloudflare's continued innovations to protect data, and in particular, their vision and roadmap for services like DLP and CASB."

relatedBlades.title: Ready to discuss your data protection needs?
Cloudflare's connectivity cloud simplifies and streamlines data visibility and protection
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare's unified platform of cloud-native security and connectivity services is the ideal foundation for data protection:

columnContent.title: Composable architecture
columnContent.description: Meet any use case with full API programmability and location-customizable logging, routing, caching, and decryption

columnContent.title: Integration
columnContent.description: Preserve user experiences with single-pass inspection and a network that's %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of Internet users

columnContent.title: Threat intelligence
columnContent.description: Block more threats  known and unknown  with intelligence gleaned from proxying ~20% of the web and blocking %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion daily threats

columnContent.title: Unified interface
columnContent.description: Reduce tool sprawl and alert fatigue by uniting hybrid work security services in one UI
